sentences.cn: 禁止星期天营业的法令

sentences.en: He advocated, though he did not practise. the prohibition of alcohol.
sentences.cn: 虽然还没付诸实施,但他主张禁止饮酒.

sentences.en: In ancient times, the prohibition of alcoholic drinks was common.
sentences.cn: 在古代, 禁酒是经常发生的事.

sentences.en: Next year will be the 60th anniversary of the repeal of Prohibition.
sentences.cn: 明年将是禁酒令废除60周年。

sentences.en: Not prohibition, but carefully biased options are what we offer him.
sentences.cn: 我们不是提出禁制, 而是仔细考虑的偏重方案.

sentences.en: Prohibition is an important means of protecting commercial secrets.
sentences.cn: 竞业禁止是保护商业秘密的重要手段.

sentences.en: Prohibition of marriage within the gens except in the case of heiresses.
sentences.cn: 禁止氏族内部通婚,但和女继承人结婚例外.

sentences.en: The goal of Anti - Saloon leader was at first local option or state - wide prohibition.
sentences.cn: 反 酒馆同盟领导人的目标,开始是地方专卖或全州范围禁酒.

sentences.en: The prohibition against firecrackers was widely ignored on the Fourth of July.
sentences.cn: 不许放爆竹的禁令在独立纪念日广遭忽略.

sentences.en: The prohibition against smoking on school grounds is strictly enforced.
the prohibition of smoking in public areas
sentences.cn: 禁止在公共场所吸烟的规定

sentences.en: the prohibition of the sale of firearms
The same sublime authority is attributed to the new prohibition as to the old.
sentences.cn: 新禁律和旧禁律一样都有至高无上的权威.

sentences.en: They voted in favour of the prohibition of smoking in public areas.
sentences.cn: 他们投票赞成禁止在公共场所吸烟.

sentences.en: Use of the drug has not declined since its prohibition.
sentences.cn: 自从禁用该药以来,该药的使用并未减少.

sentences.en: Violation of Article 31 hereof concerning rules of compulsory enforcement or prohibition.
sentences.cn: 三违反依第三十一条所定办法中有关强制或禁止之规定.

words.tran_cn: 禁止的，禁止性的；抑制的；（费用，价格等）过高的；类同禁止的

trans.tran_cn: 禁令，禁律，〈美〉禁酒，[美史]禁酒时期，[法]诉讼中止令
trans.tran_en: the act of saying that something is illegal
